title: Lakeside land near Ranna Beach
details:
Superbly positioned, rectangular lakefront land for sale close to Ranna Beach, covering 1.65 acres and situated on the South Coast close to the popular tourist resort of Tangalle.

This is a beautiful plot with highly matured trees and few coconut trees with stunning views over a lake. The lake frontage is approximately 250 feet. A short 600 feet walk from the plot is the easily accessible white sandy Ranna beach. The beach is unspoilt and is only a short walk to the famous turtle sanctuary at Rekawa.
